item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @Robintje1 Robintje1
item.description:
@Robintje1 wrote:

Try using “||” between the !playerHasItem. Without the “”. I don’t know that this should help, but you could try. (| is not a L!)

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

i get 21 errors because of this code

if (type == 1116) { if (!playerHasItem(1542) && !playerHasItem(1543) !playerHasItem(1544) !playerHasItem(1545) !playerHasItem(1546) !playerHasItem(1547) !playerHasItem(1548)) { resetPos(); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } } if (type == 1117) { if (!playerHasItem(1542) && !playerHasItem(1543) !playerHasItem(1544) !playerHasItem(1545) !playerHasItem(1546) !playerHasItem(1547) !playerHasItem(1548)) { resetPos(); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } } if (type == 1118) { if (!playerHasItem(1542) && !playerHasItem(1543) !playerHasItem(1544) !playerHasItem(1545) !playerHasItem(1546) !playerHasItem(1547) !playerHasItem(1548)) { resetPos(); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } }
i need it fixed because ppl easily get the best items on my server because of that code

Read full topic
